CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 19, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Honor Foster Mothers - Hon. Gustav L. Schramm, judge of the Juvenile Court, is shown presenting a certificate of award to Mrs. Oscar Minor, foster mother for twelve years, while Mrs. Jerome Perkins, who has been a foster parent for sixteen years, looks on. Both matrons were given awards for excellent care to the lonely, needy foster children they have succored in their many years of service, at the impressive meeting honoring foster parents of Pittsburgh and Allegheny County, Monday night, at Stephen Foster Memorial. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Juvenile Court Judge Gustav L. Schramm presenting award certificates to foster mothers Mrs. Oscar Minor and Mrs. Jerome Perkins during event at Stephen Foster Memorial Hall
